name: enigma
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something that is mysterious and seems impossible to understand completely: She is something of an enigma. The newspapers were full of stories about the enigma of the plane's disappearance. Synonyms
closed book informal
mystery (STRANGE/UNKNOWN THING)
riddle (QUESTION)

someone or something that is mysterious and impossible to understand: He is an enigma to most people. enigmatic adjective us
